subject: Re: [Radiance-general] Workshop Day 1
body:
Hi Shamim,

The presentations were recorded separately, and will be compiled into movie files with the slides, the audio, and video of the presenters (or so I'm told). As soon as those are produced, we'll get them posted somewhere and links will be made available. Hopefully those will be ready in a few days.

-Rob



Rob Guglielmetti
NREL Commercial Buildings Research Group
Golden, CO 80401
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov

-----Original Message-----
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2013 05:37 PM Mountain Standard Time
To: Radiance general discussion
Hi Andy,

Could you make the Radiance Workshop presentations available with the audio attached?  This would really help to benefit from the ones I missed.

Shamim
Virginia Tech


On Mon, Aug 12, 2013 at 7:31 PM, Andrew McNeil <amcneil at lbl.gov<mailto:amcneil at lbl.gov>> wrote:
Hi Everyone,

Day one of the workshop was a success, thanks to our NREL hosts.  Presentations from the first day have been uploaded to radiance-online.org<http://radiance-online.org>:
http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2013-golden-co

Also, Radiance now has a facebook page!
http://www.facebook.com/RadianceSimulation

Best,
Andy
